title: FC Volna Nizhny Novgorod Oblast
text:
FC Volna Nizhny Novgorod Oblast () is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> team based in <a href="Kovernino%2C%20Koverninsky%20District%2C%20Nizhny%20Novgorod%20Oblast">Kovernino</a>. It was founded in 2016 and played on the amateur level as FC Volna Kovernino. For 2020–21 season, it received the license for the third-tier <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a>. For the occasion, it also changed the name to represent the whole <a href="Nizhny%20Novgorod%20Oblast">Nizhny Novgorod Oblast</a>.
Current squad.
As of 10 January 2022, according to the <a href="https%3A//www.pfl-russia.com/teams/10027/season-2021-2022/">FNL 2 website</a>.
